channel.title: Romik - Blogs
channel.description: Read blogs from Romik Makavana on Medium. Web Developer. Every day, Romik Makavana and thousands of other voices read, write, and share important stories here.

item.title: AuthGuard React Router V6
item.description: Integrating authentication functionality in ReactJs with React Router was a bit complicated, The main reason is there is not any pre-define structure for integration. You can define your own structure. So here I have show you some useful stuff for Authentication AuthGuard.

item.title: How to check file exist in react native using “FileSystem” API
item.description: You can check if a file exists in React Native for Android or iOS without using the react-native-fs package by using the built-in FileSystem API provided by React Native.

item.title: How to check file exist in React Native
item.description: To check if a file exists in React Native, you can use the RNFS (React Native File System) library.
